MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH34 postcode area of Tranent. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:02pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a grounded overhead line near East Saltoun affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.33pm Wednesday 17th March 2021.
